last_episode_to_air.name: The Art of Destruction
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rookies get their first taste of going toe-to-toe with the flames. An inmate-firefighter starts her new life, and a fire's detritus becomes artwork.

name: Fire Chasers
overview: As California's 2016 fire season rages, brave backcountry firefighters race to put out the flames, protect homes and save lives in this docuseries.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: As California's 2016 fire season rages, brave backcountry firefighters race to put out the flames, protect homes and save lives in this docuseries.

episodes.name: The New Normal
episodes.overview: In California, authorities study environmental changes that fuel increasingly fierce wildfires, and a group of inmates train to become firefighters.

episodes.name: After Burn
episodes.overview: Firefighters enter a smoke-filled canyon to combat a deadly blaze. Turning their lives around, two inmates join firefighting crews.

episodes.name: Keep These Jackasses Wet
episodes.overview: Homeowners sift through the wreckage left behind by a fire. Rookies face tough training challenges. A veteran firefighter recalls a tragedy.

episodes.name: The Art of Destruction
episodes.overview: Rookies get their first taste of going toe-to-toe with the flames. An inmate-firefighter starts her new life, and a fire's detritus becomes artwork.
